001package pkg_class;
002
003import pkg_class.pkg_command.CommandWords;
004import pkg_class.pkg_item.ItemEdible;
005import pkg_class.pkg_item.SkillBook;
006import pkg_class.pkg_item.Beamer;
007import pkg_class.pkg_room.DarkRoom;
008import pkg_class.pkg_room.TransporterRoom;
009import pkg_class.pkg_room.Door;
010import pkg_class.pkg_pnj.TravellerPnj;
011import pkg_class.pkg_pnj.GuidePnj;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014
015/**
016 * DÃ©crivez votre classe GameModel ici.
017 *
018 * @author Poul Henriksen + Elie DUBOUX
019 * @version 2005.02 + 2021.01
020 */
021public class GameModel
022{
023    /**
024     * The player.
025     */
026    private Player aPlayer;
027    /**
028     * The rooms of the game.
029     */
030    private List<Room> aRooms;
031    /**
032     * The items of the game.
033     */
034    private List<Item> aItems;
035    /**
036     * The command words.
037     */
038    private CommandWords aCommandWords;
039    /**
040     * Constructeur d'objets de classe GameModel
041     */
042    public GameModel()
043    {
044        this.aPlayer       = new Player("", 10, 20);
045        this.aRooms        = new ArrayList<Room>();
046        this.aItems        = new ArrayList<Item>();
047        this.aCommandWords = new CommandWords();
048        this.initialiseRoomsAndItems();
049    }
050    
051    /**
052     * This method create the rooms and set their exits.
053     * Is called in the constructor.
054     */
055    private void initialiseRoomsAndItems()
056    {
057        //Create the items as (name, description, weight, price)
058        Item vFeather  = new Item("feather","A mysterious feather, you feel a strange power coming from it.",
059                                        0, 20);
060        Item vDaisy    = new Item("daisy","Common flower that you can find near water.",
061                                        1, 1);
062        Item vMoss     = new Item("moss","Common plant that grows on the Spawn.",
063                                        1, 1);
064        Item vSeaWeed  = new Item("seaweed", "Plant that you can find underwater.",
065                                        1, 4);
066        //Edible Items
067        ItemEdible vBamboo   = new ItemEdible("bamboo","Edible, given by the humans near the fence.",
068                                        2, 0);
069        ItemEdible vApple    = new ItemEdible("apple","Edible, you can buy some in the shop.",
070                                        2, 5);
071        ItemEdible vRoot     = new ItemEdible("root","Edible, you can find those near trees.",
072                                        2, 1);
073        ItemEdible vCookie   = new ItemEdible("cookie", "Edible, increase the maximum weight you can carry.",
074                                        0, 10);
075        //Skill books
076        SkillBook vSkillBookClimb     = new SkillBook("climb","Allows you to climb the giant tree.",
077                                        1, 0);
078        SkillBook vSkillBookShrink    = new SkillBook("shrink","Allows you to slip through little holes.",
079                                        1, 0);
080        SkillBook vSkillBookSwim      = new SkillBook("swim","Allows you to swim without drowing.",
081                                        1, 0);
082        SkillBook vSkillBookLight     = new SkillBook("light","Allows you to emit light when you are in a dark room.",
083                                        1, 0);
084        SkillBook vSkillBookTransform = new SkillBook("transform","Allows you to transform in an other animal.",
085                                        1, 0);
086        //Special items              
087        Beamer vBeamer = new Beamer("beamer","Allows you to 'charge' a room and 'fire' to teleport the player there.",
088                                        1, 0);
089        //Complete the list of items
090        this.aItems.add(vFeather);       this.aItems.add(vDaisy);
091        this.aItems.add(vMoss);          this.aItems.add(vSeaWeed);
092        this.aItems.add(vBamboo);        this.aItems.add(vApple);
093        this.aItems.add(vRoot);          this.aItems.add(vCookie);
094        this.aItems.add(vSkillBookClimb);this.aItems.add(vSkillBookShrink);
095        this.aItems.add(vSkillBookSwim); this.aItems.add(vSkillBookTransform);
096        this.aItems.add(vBeamer);
097        
098        //Create the rooms
099        Room vSpawnRoom        = new Room("Spawn","A flat space in the middle of the cage.", 
100                                "spawn.jpg");
101        Room vFenceRoom        = new Room("Fence", "A tall fence covered with barbed wire is in front of you.",
102                                "fence.jpg");
103        Room vLakeRoom         = new Room("Lake","A peacefull little lake with a waterfall that goes underground.", 
104                                "lake_ext.jpg");
105        Room vRockRoom         = new Room("Rock","A giant rock covered with moss.", 
106                                "rock.jpg");
107        Room vHutRoom          = new Room("Hut","next to an old hut, the door is close and no body seems to live here.",
108                                "old_hut.jpg");
109        Room vTreeRoom         = new Room("Tree","in front of a giant tree covered with vines that fall to the ground.",
110                                "tree.jpg");
111        Room vTreePlatformRoom = new Room("Platform","at the upper part of the tree.",
112                                "platform.jpg");
113        Room vShopRoom         = new Room("Shop","in the shop of the red pandas.", 
114                                "hut_1_ext.jpg");
115        Room vHouseRoom        = new Room("House","in one of the house of the red pandas.", 
116                                "hut_2.jpg");
117        Room vHoleRoom         = new Room("Hole","inside the hole, you can't go up but you see a dark tunnel.",
118                                "hole.jpg");
119        Room vWaterfallRoom    = new Room("Waterfall","in front of a waterfall, you seem to see the surface though it.",
120                                "waterfall.jpg");
121        DarkRoom vTunnelRoom   = new DarkRoom("Tunnel","It looks like ruins from an ancient civilisation.",
122                                "tunnel.jpg");
123        
124        //Complete the list of the rooms
125        this.aRooms.add(vSpawnRoom);       this.aRooms.add(vFenceRoom);
126        this.aRooms.add(vLakeRoom);        this.aRooms.add(vRockRoom);
127        this.aRooms.add(vHutRoom);         this.aRooms.add(vTreeRoom);
128        this.aRooms.add(vTreePlatformRoom);this.aRooms.add(vShopRoom);
129        this.aRooms.add(vHouseRoom);       this.aRooms.add(vHoleRoom);
130        this.aRooms.add(vTunnelRoom);      this.aRooms.add(vWaterfallRoom);
131        
132        //The TeleporterRoom
133        TransporterRoom vTransporterRoom = new TransporterRoom("Transporter", "surronded by an heavy mist that came suddenly as if it was magical.",
134                                "transporter.jpg",  this.aRooms);
135        this.aRooms.add(vTransporterRoom);
136        
137        //Create the PNJs
138        Pnj vMerchant  = new Pnj("merchant", "Hey wanna get some new stuff ^^");
139        TravellerPnj vTraveller = new TravellerPnj("traveller","Congratulation you fond me, if you can catch me once more ... you'll give you something.",
140                                        vTransporterRoom, vFeather);
141        GuidePnj vGuide     = new GuidePnj("guide","Hello... blah, blah, blah");
142        this.aPlayer.setGuide(vGuide);
143        
144        //Initialise the items in the rooms
145        vSpawnRoom.addItems(vMoss, 3);
146        vLakeRoom.addItems(vDaisy, 10);
147        vLakeRoom.addItems(vSeaWeed, 3);
148        vFenceRoom.addItems(vBamboo, 10);
149        vFenceRoom.addItems(vRoot, 2);
150        vRockRoom.addItems(vCookie, 1);
151        vHutRoom.addItems(vRoot, 2);
152        vTreeRoom.addItems(vRoot, 2);
153        vTreeRoom.addItems(vSkillBookClimb, 1);
154        vShopRoom.addItems(vApple, 100);
155        vShopRoom.addItems(vSkillBookShrink, 1);
156        vShopRoom.addItems(vSkillBookLight, 1);
157        vHouseRoom.addItems(vBeamer,1);
158        vHoleRoom.addItems(vSkillBookSwim, 1);
159        vTunnelRoom.addItems(vSkillBookTransform, 1);
160        vWaterfallRoom.addItems(vSeaWeed, 5);
161        
162        //Add the pnjs
163        vSpawnRoom.addPnj(vGuide);
164        vShopRoom.addPnj(vMerchant);
165        vTransporterRoom.addPnj(vTraveller);
166        
167        //Initialise room exits
168        vSpawnRoom.setExit("north", vLakeRoom);
169        vSpawnRoom.setExit("south", vFenceRoom);
170        vSpawnRoom.setExit("east", vRockRoom);
171        vSpawnRoom.setExit("west",vTreeRoom);
172        vFenceRoom.setExit("north", vSpawnRoom);
173        vLakeRoom.setExit("south", vSpawnRoom);
174        vLakeRoom.setExit("west", vHutRoom);
175        vLakeRoom.setExit("down", vWaterfallRoom);
176        vRockRoom.setExit("west", vSpawnRoom);
177        vRockRoom.setExit("down", vHoleRoom);
178        vHutRoom.setExit("south", vTreeRoom);
179        vHutRoom.setExit("east", vLakeRoom);
180        vTreeRoom.setExit("north", vHutRoom);
181        vTreeRoom.setExit("east", vSpawnRoom);
182        vTreeRoom.setExit("up", vTreePlatformRoom);
183        vTreePlatformRoom.setExit("down", vTreeRoom);
184        vTreePlatformRoom.setExit("north", vHouseRoom);
185        vTreePlatformRoom.setExit("east", vShopRoom);
186        vShopRoom.setExit("west", vTreePlatformRoom);
187        vHouseRoom.setExit("south", vTransporterRoom);
188        vHouseRoom.setExit("east", vTransporterRoom);
189        vHoleRoom.setExit("west", vTunnelRoom);
190        vTunnelRoom.setExit("east", vHoleRoom);
191        vTunnelRoom.setExit("north", vWaterfallRoom);
192        vWaterfallRoom.setExit("south", vTunnelRoom);
193        vWaterfallRoom.setExit("up", vLakeRoom);
194        
195        //Create the Doors
196        Door vDoorClimb = new Door("climb");
197        Door vDoorPush = new Door("shrink");
198        Door vDoorSwim = new Door("swim");
199        
200        //Initialise the doors
201        vTreeRoom.setDoor("up", vDoorClimb );
202        vTreePlatformRoom.setDoor("down", vDoorClimb);
203        vRockRoom.setDoor("down", vDoorPush);
204        vWaterfallRoom.setDoor("up", vDoorSwim);
205        vLakeRoom.setDoor("down", vDoorSwim);
206        
207        // the game start at the spawn
208        this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vSpawnRoom);
209    }//initialiseRoomsAndItems()
210    
211    /**
212     * Return the player.
213     * @return The player
214     */
215    public Player getPlayer()
216    {
217        return this.aPlayer;
218    }//getPlayer()
219    
220    /**
221     * Return the rooms.
222     * @return The rooms.
223     */
224    public List<Room> getRooms()
225    {
226        return this.aRooms;
227    }//getRooms()
228    
229    /**
230     * Return the welcome string.
231     * @return The welcome string.
232     */
233    public String getWelcomeString() 
234    {
235        return "\n\nWelcome to RPandaScape!\n" +
236                "RPandaScape is a new, fantastic adventure. enjoy :)\n"+
237                "Type 'help' if you need help.\n";
238    }//getWelcomeString()
239    
240    /**
241     * Return the goodbye string.
242     * @return The goodbye string. 
243     */
244    public String getGoodByeString()
245    {
246        return "Thank you for playing.  Good bye.";
247    }//getGoodByeString()
248    
249    /**
250     * Return the help string.
251     * @return The help string. 
252     */
253    public String getHelpString()
254    {
255        return "You don't really know what to do...\n" +
256               "Here are the commands that you can type.\n" +
257               "Your command words are: \n" + this.aCommandWords.getCommandList();
258    }//getHelpString()
259    
260    /**
261     * Return the game over string.
262     * @return The game over string. 
263     */
264    public String getGameOver()
265    {
266        return "\n\n\n\n*********** You are dead ***********\n\n\n\n";
267    }//getGameOver()
268    
269    /**
270     * Return the victory string.
271     * @return The victory string.
272     */
273    public String getVictory()
274    {
275        return "\n\n\n\n*********** You won ***********\n\n\n\n";
276    }
277    
278    /**
279     * The string to tell the player to go talk to the guide.
280     * @return The final advice speech.
281     */
282    public String getAdviceFinalSpeech()
283    {
284        return "\n*** It feels like the guide has something to tell you... ***\n";
285    }
286    
287    /**
288     * Return the room description string.
289     * @return The room description string. 
290     */
291    public String getLocationInfo() 
292    {
293        return this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() + "\n" +
294               "The energy you have now : " + this.aPlayer.getCurrentEnergy();
295    }//getLocationInfo()
296}//GameModel
